2: All members receive additional Concerto Vibrancy.
4: Gain extra Resonance Energy when any character triggers a Concerto Effect.
6: For each Resonance Liberation used, the entire team gains a 20% increase in damage for 12s.
8: After successfully performing an extreme evasion, receive 20% increase in Crit. Rate, stacks up to 3 times, effect lasts 8 seconds, repeated evasions refreshes its duration.
